attributes.action: Ban councils from criminalizing over filled Wheelie bins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The case against Gareth Corkhill for over-filling his bin is an abuse of power, especially as the Council concerned insisted on the ridiculous 2 week collection process.
NOBODY should have a criminal record because his bin was too full - what next? Thought Police??
The Copeland Council have gone too far, and the Government should urgently intervene.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
